en: He had sexual relations with a woman during the day.

ngiemboon: À lɔgɔ́ wɔ́ɔn jʉʼʉ fàʼ ye.
en: He employed me in his workplace.

ngiemboon: À zoonté wɔ́ɔn, ńdɔgɔ púʼu ńgwága wɔ́ɔn.
en: He insulted me in order to simplify me.

ngiemboon: N dɔɔn ne ńguɔ, n gʉa lɔ́gtà.
en: If I'm sick, I go to the hospital.

ngiemboon: Giŋ lê ndɔɔn laa láʼa mánzsè wɔ́.
en: He who walks slowly never sleeps on the way.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gwě ssé ɔ̀ tè gɔɔn ńdɔɔn wɔ́.
en: I fell, you didn't say patience.

ngiemboon: Mbàŋa wɔɔn aa kwàʼ ndɔ̀ʼɔ fùʼ.
en: This man is truly one who loves free things.
